## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6184d59fa1e765738b50981a8e7094d0744e987e5eadeaeebd3747d036edd22a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'resolve-uri-latest' @ 9.999.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
